stimulusHtml: Which of the following explanations would a developmental psychologist generally offer to Sarah?

features.html: Sarah is the mother of an eight-month-old boy named Connor. Connor has been struggling to sit up on his own without assistance. While visiting a friend, Sarah noticed that her friendâ€™s five-month-old daughter was sitting up with ease.

choicesHtml: Positive punishment can encourage Connor to sit up.
Although sitting upright with no assistance is a major milestone, many babies will develop within a range of ages.
It is likely that Connor has a genetic disorder that needs to be treated immediately.
Connor needs physical therapy to help him coordinate his muscle movements better.
